relation.text: 1786 My dear Ly- Frances Harpur I did not Receive
deprived Us , of poor Lady Warwick ; has been this Autumn
Interested for Ld . Brooke , He Is a Most Interesting charming Boy ; -- I am very glad My Recipes have been of Use to you ; -- I now
a Day , before Breakfast , & before Dinner ; It Must be fresh , or new laid
two Years w . great Benefits ; -- I am not certain If Miſs Rundell Attends in Lying-In Cases ; but I think
